title: Automatic Authentication via Toss SDK
description: Verify that the user is automatically authenticated via Toss SDK integration without any visible login UI and that a Firebase user document is created for new users.

steps.description: Open the app inside the Toss app via WebView
Verify the Toss SDK initiates automatic authentication
Check that no explicit login UI or screen is displayed
Verify a loading spinner is shown temporarily during authentication
Confirm that a valid Firebase user document is created or retrieved
Validate fallback anonymous authentication occurs if Toss SDK fails

title: Add New Emotion-Tagged Receipt
description: Verify that a user can successfully add a new spending receipt with an amount, selected emotion, and optional short memo via the bottom sheet modal UI.

steps.description: Tap the '+' button to open the Add Receipt modal
Input a numeric amount using the numeric keypad
Select one of the five emotion radio buttons
Enter a short memo up to 20 characters
Press the save button
Verify that the receipt is saved to Firestore with correct data (amount, emotion, memo)
Confirm the modal closes and the receipt feed updates with the new receipt shown at the top

title: Receipt Feed Infinite Scroll Loading
description: Verify that the receipt feed loads receipts in descending date order and supports infinite scroll loading older receipts.

steps.description: Open the receipt feed screen after login
Check that initial receipts are shown in descending date order
Scroll down to the bottom of the feed
Verify that older receipts are loaded and appended to the feed
Confirm no duplicate receipts appear and ordering is maintained

title: Delete Receipt with Animation and Sound
description: Verify that a receipt can be deleted via swipe or long-press, triggering a tearing sound and animation, and is removed from Firestore and UI.

steps.description: Locate a receipt in the feed
Swipe the receipt or long-press to initiate deletion
Verify that a confirmation or direct deletion occurs
Confirm a tearing animation runs on the receipt
Verify a tearing sound plays during deletion
Confirm the receipt is removed from Firestore and no longer appears in the feed

title: Statistics Dashboard Monthly Summary Display
description: Verify that the statistics dashboard correctly displays the current month's total expenditure, emotional breakdown via donut charts, and mood thermometer with insight messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the statistics screen
Check the current month's total expenditure value is displayed correctly
Verify donut charts reflect the proportion of different emotions in spending
Confirm the mood thermometer visualization shows dominant spending emotion intensity accurately
Verify presence and accuracy of insight messages related to emotional spending patterns

title: Image Capture and Native Sharing Functionality
description: Verify that the app can capture the statistics dashboard or receipt views as images via html2canvas and share them successfully through native sharing dialogs on mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the statistics dashboard screen
Trigger the image capture feature to generate an image of the dashboard
Verify that the generated image matches the visible dashboard content accurately
Invoke the native sharing dialog to share the captured image
Confirm the native share dialog opens with the captured image ready for sharing
Test sharing to available apps and verify the image is transmitted successfully

title: Input Modal Validation and Limits
description: Verify input validation in the Add Receipt modal: amount accepts only numeric input, memo is limited to 20 characters, and an emotion must be selected before saving.

steps.description: Open the Add Receipt modal
Try entering non-numeric characters in the amount field
Verify non-numeric input is rejected or prevented
Enter a memo longer than 20 characters
Confirm the memo input is limited to 20 characters or shows appropriate error
Try to save the receipt without selecting an emotion
Verify that the save button is disabled or an error message appears requiring emotion selection

title: Daily Limit Enforcement on Adding Receipts
description: Verify that the app enforces any configured daily limit on the number of receipts a user can add, preventing further additions when the limit is reached.

steps.description: Add receipts up to the daily limit
Confirm each receipt is accepted until the limit is reached
Attempt to add one additional receipt after reaching the limit
Verify that the app prevents adding the receipt and displays an appropriate error or info message

title: UI Responsiveness and Visual Correctness on Mobile WebView
description: Verify that the receipt feed, modal inputs, statistics dashboard, and animations render correctly with smooth transitions and adhere to the design guidelines (fonts, colors, receipt aesthetic) on various mobile devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the app on multiple target mobile devices and screen resolutions inside Toss WebView
Check visual correctness of the receipt feed including font sizes, colors, and scroll performance
Open the Add Receipt bottom sheet modal and verify input fields and buttons are displayed correctly and functional
Navigate to the statistics dashboard and check chart and mood thermometer renderings and colors
Confirm animations such as receipt deletion play smoothly without jank

title: Firestore CRUD Operations Integrity
description: Verify Firestore correctly performs Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations for receipts with correct ordering and limits, ensuring data integrity and consistency.

steps.description: Create multiple receipts via the app interface
Verify all created receipts appear in Firestore with correct data and timestamps
Modify an existing receipt's note or emotion if editing is supported
Verify updates are reflected properly in Firestore and in the app UI
Delete a receipt
Confirm it is removed from Firestore and no longer visible in the app
Query receipts with pagination or limits (e.g., infinite scroll)
Verify correct ordering by date descending and adherence to limit per page
